DescriptionData.Title: Bonzo's Complete Book of Skits - DeChant
DescriptionData.Description: Bonzo's Complete Book of Skits contains skits for all varieties of performers from clowns to summer campers. They allow a large audience to watch, participate and laugh at the antics of the performers. Most skits involve two or more people, and there are also some materials for solo performers. 121-page illustrated paperback.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 121-page illustrated paperback book of performer's skits
Includes acts for large to small audiences
Skits for multiple actors and solo acts covered
Bonzo is a famous entertainer and teacher
